title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. C, ch. I, pt. 6000 - Rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. C, ch. I, pt. 6000 - Rules

State Regulations
§ 6000.1 - Board office
§ 6000.2 - Admission upon examination
§ 6000.3 - Examinations and other requirements
§ 6000.4 - Application to sit for the New York State Bar Examination (UBE) and proof required of applicants
§ 6000.5 - Assignment and certification of applicants
§ 6000.6 - Registration for New York Law Course (NYLC) and New York Law Examination (NYLE)
§ 6000.7 - Automatic regrading of certain examination answers
§ 6000.8 - Publication of essay questions and selected applicants' answers
§ 6000.9 - Attendance and withdrawal
§ 6000.10 - Application for waiver of rules
§ 6000.11 - Automatic regrading of certain examination answers
§ 6000.12 - Publication and release of Multistate Essay Examination (MEE) and Multistate Performance Test (MPT) questions, failed candidate answers and selected answers of passing applicants
§ 6000.13 - Fraud, dishonesty and other misconduct
§ 6000.14 - Schedule of fees
§ 6000.15 - Application for waiver of rules

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. C, ch. I, pt. 6000

Statutory authority: Rules of the Court of

Appeals, § 520.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
